sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rn , TB.* FROM ( SELECT dealer_cd , contract_no , business_id , brch_cd , center_cd , brch_nm , sale_man_cd , sale_man_nm , customer_cd , out_place_cd , business_type , industry_type , TO_CHAR(assign_req_dt, 'YYYYMMDD') AS assign_req_dt , TO_CHAR(assign_dt, 'YYYYMMDD') AS assign_dt , TO_CHAR(cancel_dt, 'YYYYMMDD') AS cancel_dt , status_cd , model_cd , spec_cd , car_cd , out_basic_cnt , sale_amt , color_cd , TO_CHAR(payment_dt, 'YYYYMMDD') AS payment_dt , total_sale_amt , sale_cd , inst_perd , TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYYMMDD') AS out_dt , cont_amt , indo_amt , init_rate , allotment_amt , ija_rate , loss_collection_amt , nonmove_estate_amt , TO_CHAR(cont_dt, 'YYYYMMDD') AS cont_dt , business_no , resident_no , resident_nm , business_nm , resident_addr , business_addr , resident_tel_no , business_tel_no , resident_post_cd , business_post_cd , TO_CHAR(dlvy_prms_dt_1, 'YYYYMMDD') AS dlvy_prms_dt_1 , dlvy_prms_amt_1 , TO_CHAR(dlvy_prms_dt_2, 'YYYYMMDD') AS dlvy_prms_dt_2 , dlvy_prms_amt_2 , TO_CHAR(dlvy_prms_dt_3, 'YYYYMMDD') AS dlvy_prms_dt_3 , dlvy_prms_amt_3 , TO_CHAR(dlvy_prms_dt_4, 'YYYYMMDD') AS dlvy_prms_dt_4 , dlvy_prms_amt_4 , TO_CHAR(dlvy_prms_dt_5, 'YYYYMMDD') AS dlvy_prms_dt_5 , dlvy_prms_amt_5 , stamp_amt , fixed_dc_amt , fixed_dc_rate , unfixed_dc_amt , dlvy_prms_yn_1 , dlvy_prms_yn_2 , dlvy_prms_yn_3 , dlvy_prms_yn_4 , dlvy_prms_yn_5 , sp_sale_amt , estable_pay_gu , consign_amt , fina_amt , consign_cd , estable_pay_rate , guarantee_amt , estable_amt , sale_type_cd , option_cd , option_amt , allotment_end , guarantee_rate , new_ija_rate , sales_promotion_cd , grace_amt_1 , grace_ija_rate_1 , grace_comp_rate_1 , car_no , cont_cnt , cancel_cnt , self_ija_amt , bank_ija_amt , car_sale_amt , color_amt , buy_type_cd , use_type_cd , hand_person_cd , remark , tuk_tp , vat_tp , tuk_amt , edk_amt , vat_amt , TO_CHAR(assign_basis_date, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS assign_basis_date , TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS reg_date , TO_CHAR(updt_date, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS updt_date , updt_user_cd , jumin_post_cd , jumin_post_addr , chassis_no , TO_CHAR(expect_dt, 'YYYYMMDD') AS expect_dt , fleet_cust_mk , out_place_type , out_to_area , trans_amt , out_place_amt , trust_cd , special_dc_amt , once_dc_amt , emp_dc_amt , flaw_dc_amt , long_dc_amt , display_dc_amt , fleet_dc_amt , campaign_dc_amt , pro_dc_amt , add_dc_amt , card_dc_amt , auto_dc_amt , etc_dc_amt , pay_cd , capital_cd , TO_CHAR(begin_accept_dt, 'YYYYMMDD') AS begin_accept_dt , pay_keep_term , pay_keep_rate , delay_term , delay_rate , delay_use_rate , pay_type , pay_use_grade , offtax_stat , TO_CHAR(offtax_appr_dttm, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS offtax_appr_dttm , offtax_user_cd , reduct_cd , reduct_tuk_amt , reduct_tuk_rate , TO_CHAR(appr_dt, 'YYYYMMDD') AS appr_dt , appr_seq , contract_status , reg_user_cd , receipt_no , receipt_stat , TO_CHAR(receipt_appr_dttm, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS receipt_appr_dttm , receipt_appr_no , hand_phone_no , pay_status , TO_CHAR(pay_appr_dttm, 'YYYYMMDD') AS pay_appr_dttm , pay_appr_no , TO_CHAR(bef_signoff_dt, 'YYYYMMDD') AS bef_signoff_dt , bef_chassis_no , remark2 , pay_crdt_rate , stock_amt , contract_no_o , email , old_car_plan , old_car_maker , old_car_model , old_car_my , resident_post_reg_no , business_post_reg_no , jumin_post_reg_no , sales_modl_cd , TO_CHAR(indo_dt, 'YYYYMMDD') AS indo_dt , ew_item_cd , ew_item_amt , TO_CHAR(hist_regist_de, 'YYYYMMDD') AS hist_regist_de , action_code FROM ih_delivy WHERE hist_regist_de = #histRegistDe# ORDER BY hist_regist_de, dealer_cd, contract_no ) TB WHERE rownum <= (#_page# + 1) * #_pagesize# ) WHERE rn >= #_skiprows# + 1

pay_type , pay_use_grade , offtax_stat , offtax_appr_dttm , offtax_user_cd , reduct_cd , reduct_tuk_amt , reduct_tuk_rate , appr_dt , appr_seq , contract_status , reg_user_cd , receipt_no , receipt_stat , receipt_appr_dttm , receipt_appr_no , hand_phone_no , pay_status , pay_appr_dttm , pay_appr_no , bef_signoff_dt , bef_chassis_no , remark2 , pay_crdt_rate , stock_amt , contract_no_o , hist_regist_de , action_code ) VALUES ( #dealerCd# , #contractNo# , #businessId# , #brchCd# , #centerCd# , #brchNm# , #saleManCd# , #saleManNm# , #customerCd# , #outPlaceCd# , #businessType# , #industryType# , TO_DATE(#assignReqDt#, 'YYYYMMDD') , TO_DATE(#assignDt#, 'YYYYMMDD') , TO_DATE(#cancelDt#, 'YYYYMMDD') , #statusCd# , #modelCd# , #specCd# , #carCd# , #outBasicCnt# , #saleAmt# , #colorCd# , TO_DATE(#paymentDt#, 'YYYYMMDD') , #totalSaleAmt# , #saleCd# , #instPerd# , TO_DATE(#outDt#, 'YYYYMMDD') , #contAmt# , #indoAmt# , #initRate# , #allotmentAmt# , #ijaRate# , #lossCollectionAmt# , #nonmoveEstateAmt# , TO_DATE(#contDt#, 'YYYYMMDD') , #businessNo# , #residentNo# , #residentNm# , #businessNm# , #residentAddr# , #businessAddr# , #residentTelNo# , 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , TO_DATE(#regDate#, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , TO_DATE(#updtDate#, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , #updtUserCd# , #juminPostCd# , #juminPostAddr# , #chassisNo# , TO_DATE(#expectDt#, 'YYYYMMDD') , #fleetCustMk# , #outPlaceType# , #outToArea# , #transAmt# , #outPlaceAmt# , #trustCd# , #specialDcAmt# , #onceDcAmt# , #empDcAmt# , #flawDcAmt# , #longDcAmt# , #displayDcAmt# , #fleetDcAmt# , #campaignDcAmt# , #proDcAmt# , #addDcAmt# , #cardDcAmt# , #autoDcAmt# , #etcDcAmt# , #payCd# , #capitalCd# , TO_DATE(#beginAcceptDt#, 'YYYYMMDD') , #payKeepTerm# , #payKeepRate# , #delayTerm# , #payStatus# , TO_DATE(#payApprDttm#, 'YYYYMMDD') , #payApprNo# , TO_DATE(#befSignoffDt#, 'YYYYMMDD') , #befChassisNo# , #remark2# , #payCrdtRate# , #stockAmt# , #contractNoO# , #email# , #oldCarPlan# , #oldCarMaker# , #oldCarModel# , #oldCarMy# , #residentPostRegNo# , #businessPostRegNo# , #juminPostRegNo# , #salesModlCd# , TO_DATE(#indoDt#, 'YYYYMMDD') , #ewItemCd# , #ewItemAmt# , TRUNC(TO_DATE(#histRegistDe#, 'YYYYMMDD')) , #actionCode# )
sqlMap.update: MERGE INTO if_delivy b USING dual ON ( dealer_cd = #dealerCd# AND contract_no = #contractNo# ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET business_id = #businessId# , brch_cd = #brchCd# , center_cd = #centerCd# , brch_nm = #brchNm# , sale_man_cd = #saleManCd# , sale_man_nm = #saleManNm# , customer_cd = #customerCd# , out_place_cd = #outPlaceCd# , business_type = #businessType# , industry_type = #totalSaleAmt# , sale_cd = #saleCd# , inst_perd = #instPerd# , out_dt = TO_DATE(#outDt#, 'YYYYMMDD') , cont_amt = #contAmt# , indo_amt = #indoAmt# , init_rate = #initRate# , allotment_amt =
